title: @Riot Inspiration for Program skin line?
body:
I'm really digging the futuristic aspect of this program skin line, while still defining it from the vast amount of other mechanical skin lines. Lots of cables, plastic plates a sort of sterilized cyber theme. 

I wonder if anyone can chime in on what inspirations were drawn in the creation of this skin line? I'm getting a pretty big Phantasy Star Online fee from Soraka specifically.
